text: Fluorite Onsen Mountain Lake · Oak Timber 12 · Egg beside Annie’s palm branches · Bubble still being hunted.
Once daily quests finish, rerun Dream Bubble/piano sequences to trigger the furniture bubble instead of just grinding.
Onsen Egg Promise Day 11 + furniture bubble tracker (Day 1–5, Day 6+, Snowman locations).
